=Presentation of Omega Engine=
==Introduction==
Omega engine (or ohmengine), is a small "game engine", based on the Irrlicht 3d engine. It provides a API for make games easily.

==Detailed presentation==

===Features===
ohmengine (when I'll finish my current objective) includes a graphics support (with Irrlicht), audio (with OpenAL), physics (with the irrBullet wrapper), network, and it has some other features.

===Why this engine ?===
First, for my pleasure. Indeed, I love programming and I spend a lot of my free time in that. Second, for learn some tips, use some libraries, and many other things.
